column4: why is ubuntu too slow on my laptop? celeron 2.4 ... 1GIG RAM .... 128 intergrated video card ATI.. it takes it 3 minutes to load... however PClinuxOS takes it 25 seconds??? is there anything i did wrong? even when i do login it seems choppy and slow and 3D effect "sometimes work" depending on its mood. ??? anyone? any suggestions? thx
